name: Little Light (supahsaiyan)
description:
Little Light is a creepy 2D click to move adventure game dark that tells the gloomy tale of a young girl by the name of Annie who is trapped underground. When she is at her most vulnerable and loneliest state, she is met by a light that gives her warmth and comfort. She then follows the light in the hope that she can one day make it to the surface however, she must first face the dangers of the darkness that is all around her.

Take the form of a light as you send out particles to aid young Annie through this dark underground world. In this pitch black setting, you must be her eyes,

Assets used in the creation of this game include:

  • https://freesound.org/people/PSOVOD/sounds/415186/
  • https://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/151232/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Karma-Ron/sounds/240623/
  • https://freesound.org/people/SiyaMahlobo/sounds/492807/
  • https://freesound.org/people/Tristan/sounds/19458/
  • https://grassclipart.netlify.app/grass-clipart-black-and-white-vector
